title: This Trending Video Is An Entertaining Lesson On Shopping Wisely This Sale Season!
text:
PARTNER

With the festive season on, there’s a plethora of deals and discounts floating in the market, and quite understandably, we can’t keep calm! So much so that sometimes we end up hoarding any and everything. That’s where the trouble begins.

There’s no denying that everything seems like a “must-buy” when it's on a discounted rate. However, we often end up picking things mindlessly in such a situation. I mean, think about that cool dude T-shirt you bought but never wore, or maybe those extra phone covers that keep lying in the drawer - just so pointless!

ET Money’s latest campaign brings to light such hurried and mindless shopping shenanigans that we need to stray away from. In the video, a couple of shoe pairs can be seen back-chatting about the owner - right from “he hasn’t worn us in 2 years” to “dude, he hasn’t even taken us out of the box yet”. This video highlights how we keep adding things to our lot - be it shoes or shirts, clearly when we don’t need it.

There’s no doubt that sale season spells out “splurge”, but only on the things we need. Come on, guys! Monitor discount offers and teasers on the items that you actually need - those swanky stilettos, a new phone, or anything else that you’ve been eyeing. Make the discounts count, and dish out money on something that you genuinely need.

This sale season, let’s quit being just another frenzied customer, and add to cart wisely!
